description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Mushroom Stroganoff with Zucchini Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mixed Mushroom Stroganoff with Zucchini Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40g South Cape Fetta Greek Style, crumbled
1 pkt Maggi beef stroganoff recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter and oil in pan, add onion and mushrooms, cook over low heat 5-8 minutes or until golden. Add combined 1 1/3 cup (330mL) water and MAGGI Recipe Base; bring to boil, stirring. Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until thickened.
Meanwhile, place zoodles in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water. Stand for 20-40 seconds. Drain well, arrange zoodles on serving platter.
Stir sour cream through mushroom mixture. Serve over cooked zoodles, top with feta.
